attributes.action: have cctv cameras placed in all police stations, interview rooms, cells and police cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that this would be a very good idea to implement the concept of CCTV within the police force.  The reason behind my suggestion is that I believe  courts require a better insight into cases where evidence is subject to mediocrity ie police misguiding peoples statements.  This would ensure that there is always a watchful eye and that the law is abided as written and intended.  This protects police and members of the public
